content.name: Olympus
content.description:
Olympus aka standalone Super Asgard
32x L turrets, 92x M Turrets, 118M shields, 4XL shields
Huge thanks to @gso25mm, who let me use his turret/shield connections from mod Super Asgard.
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2430723151
This mod does not modify vanilla Asgard and acts as a new ship.
Cost around 2.5x more in resources and credits when compared to vanilla Asgard. Also build time was prolonged almost 2x.
Mod also contains new weapon Olympus Main Battery which is alternative to vanilla xl main battery mk1. This weapon can be only used on Olympus. (Can fire around 2x longer until overheat kicks in, recharge is still slow thought)
Can be build only with blueprint, same conditions as for vanilla Asgard. Or use following mod:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2447654098
Save flag is set to 0, but i doubt that save will work if mod is disabled after blueprint or ship is bought or under construction.
Compatible with More Ship Rooms.
[VRO compatible version] https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2457316956
